18 namespace vistle {
19 
20 enum DepthFormat {
21  DepthInteger,
22  DepthFloat,
23  DepthRGBA,
24 };
25 
27 template<int Precision, int BitsPerPixel, int ScaleBits=0>
28 struct DepthQuantize {
29  enum {
30  edge = 4, // only 4 works
31  scale_bits = ScaleBits,
32  bits_per_pixel = BitsPerPixel,
33  precision = Precision,
34  num_bytes = (BitsPerPixel*edge*edge)/8
35  };
36 
37  uint8_t depth[2][precision/8];
38  uint8_t bits[num_bytes];
39 };
40 
41 typedef DepthQuantize<16, 4, 0> DepthQuantize16;
42 typedef DepthQuantize<24, 3, 4> DepthQuantize24;
43 
45 template<class DepthQuantize>
46 #ifdef __CUDACC__
47 __device__ __host__
48 #endif
49 inline void setdepth(DepthQuantize &q, int idx, uint32_t value) {
50  for (unsigned i=3; i>0; --i) {
51  if (i <= sizeof(q.depth[idx]))
52  q.depth[idx][i-1] = value & 0xff;
53  value >>= 8;
54  }
55 }
56 
58 template<class DepthQuantize>
59 #ifdef __CUDACC__
60 __device__ __host__
61 #endif
62 uint32_t getdepth(const DepthQuantize &q, int idx);
63 
65 template<class DepthQuantize>
66 #ifdef __CUDACC__
67 __device__ __host__
68 #endif
69 void dq_clearbits(DepthQuantize &q) {
70  for (unsigned i=0; i<sizeof(q.bits); ++i) {
71  q.bits[i] = 0;
72  }
73 }
74 
76 template<class DepthQuantize>
77 #ifdef __CUDACC__
78 __device__ __host__
79 #endif
80 inline void dq_setbit(DepthQuantize &q, int bit, unsigned value=1) {
81  q.bits[bit>>3] |= (value & 1)<<(bit&7);
82 }
83 
85 template<class DepthQuantize>
86 #ifdef __CUDACC__
87 __device__ __host__
88 #endif
89 void dq_clearbit(DepthQuantize &q, int bit) {
90  q.bits[bit>>3] &= ~(1<<(bit&7));
91 }
92 
94 template<class DepthQuantize>
95 #ifdef __CUDACC__
96 __device__ __host__
97 #endif
98 inline unsigned dq_getbit(const DepthQuantize &q, int bit) {
99  return (q.bits[bit>>3]>>(bit&7)) & 1;
100 }
101 
103 template<class DepthQuantize>
104 #ifdef __CUDACC__
105 __device__ __host__
106 #endif
107 inline void dq_setbits(DepthQuantize &q, int bit, int nbits, unsigned value, int block=1) {
108 #if 0
109  for (int i=bit; i<bit+nbits; ++i) {
110  dq_setbit(q, i, value&1);
111  value >>= 1;
112  }
113 #else
114  const uint32_t mask = (1<<block)-1;
115  for (int i=bit+nbits-1; i>=bit; i-=block) {
116  q.bits[i>>3] |= (value & mask)<<(i&7);
117  value >>= block;
118  }
119 #endif
120 }

123 template<class DepthQuantize>
124 #ifdef __CUDACC__
125 __device__ __host__
126 #endif
127 inline void dq_setbits(DepthQuantize &q, uint64_t bits) {
128  for (int i=0; i<DepthQuantize::num_bytes; ++i) {
129  //for (int i = DepthQuantize::num_bytes; i>=0; --i) {
130  q.bits[i] = bits & 0xff;
131  bits >>= 8;
132  }
133 }
134 
136 template<class DepthQuantize>
137 #ifdef __CUDACC__
138 __device__ __host__
139 #endif
140 inline unsigned dq_getbits(const DepthQuantize &q, int bit, int nbits) {
141  unsigned v = 0;
142  for (int i=bit+nbits-1; i>=bit; --i) {
143  v <<= 1;
144  v |= dq_getbit(q, i);
145  }
146  return v;
147 }
148 
150 template<class DepthQuantize>
151 #ifdef __CUDACC__
152 __device__ __host__
153 #endif
154 inline uint64_t dq_getbits(const DepthQuantize &q) {
155  uint64_t bits = q.bits[DepthQuantize::num_bytes-1];
156  for (int i=DepthQuantize::num_bytes-2; i>=0; --i) {
157  bits <<= 8;
158  bits |= q.bits[i];
159  }
160  return bits;
161 }

163 template<DepthFormat format, int bpp>
164 #ifdef __CUDACC__
165 __device__ __host__
166 #endif
167 inline uint32_t get_depth(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h);
168 
169 template<>
170 #ifdef __CUDACC__
171 __device__ __host__
172 #endif
173 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthFloat, 4>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
174 
175  const float df = ((float *)img)[y*w+x];
176  uint32_t di = df * 0x00ffffffU;
177  if (di > 0x00ffffffU)
178  di = 0x00ffffffU;
179  return di;
180 }
181 
182 template<>
183 #ifdef __CUDACC__
184 __device__ __host__
185 #endif
186 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthRGBA, 4>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
187 
188  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*4];
189  return ((dp[2]*256 + dp[1])*256 + dp[0]);
190 }
191 
192 template<>
193 #ifdef __CUDACC__
194 __device__ __host__
195 #endif
196 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 1>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
197 
198  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*1];
199  return *dp * 0x0010101U;
200 }
201 
202 template<>
203 #ifdef __CUDACC__
204 __device__ __host__
205 #endif
206 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 2>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
207 
208  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*2];
209  return (dp[1]*256 + dp[0])*256 + dp[1];
210 }
211 
212 template<>
213 #ifdef __CUDACC__
214 __device__ __host__
215 #endif
216 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 3>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
217 
218  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*3];
219  return ((dp[3]*256 + dp[2])*256 + dp[1]);
220 }

226 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 4>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
227 
228  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*4];
229  return ((dp[3]*256 + dp[2])*256 + dp[1]);
230 }
